entry.title: Monday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 42 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 42 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
